text: Pajƣamʙarason guft, ki nisoni podsohii u in ast, ki ʙa sumo sanduqe meojad, va in sanduq ʙa dasti dusmanon aftoda ʙud. Dar on Tavrot va oromii dil az Parvardigoraton va ʙoqii merosi xonadoni Muso va xonadoni Horun dar on ast, monandi aso va porahoe az Tavrot, ki faristagon onro meʙardorand. In ʙaroi sumo iʙratest. Agar mu'min ʙosed, Tolutro ʙa amri Alloh ʙa podsohi ixtijor kuned
